      • transactionBuffer

        public static boolean transactionBuffer​(Bank db,
                                        java.lang.String sn,
                                        java.lang.String ss,
                                        java.lang.String a,
                                        java.lang.String rn,
                                        java.lang.String rd,
                                        java.lang.String sa)
        transactionBuffer: Depending on what the header action request, the buffer will call different methods and complete the task.
        Parameters:
        db - Bank: all users (linked list)
        sn - String: Sender name
        ss - String: Sender source
        a - String: Action
        rn - String: reciever name
        rd - String: receiver destination
        sa - String: sender amount
        Returns:
        Boolean: transaction was complete? User found? IMPPORTANT: Test if the user that does not exists can still preform task

      • autoLogin

        public static Bank autoLogin​(Bank db,
                             java.lang.String userToLogin)
        autoLogin: Logs in into the requested user if found, otherwise it will not
        Parameters:
        db - Bank: All users (linked list)
        userToLogin - String: user to be login
        Returns:
        Bank: user was found! or null if not

      • transactions

        public static boolean transactions​(Bank db,
                                   java.lang.String fileName)
        Transaction: This method will get the array of strings that contain the header of the .txt file read. it will then look through the txt file to find the data that corresponds to it. It will then send that information to a buffer to be cpompleted. Prints out if action was completed or not
        Parameters:
        db - Bank: contains all users (link list)
        fileName - String: Name of file
        Returns:
        Boolean: when all the tasks have been finished

      • fileFields

        public static java.lang.String[] fileFields​(java.lang.String fileName)
        fileFields: will open a file and look for its header located in the first line of the file. It will then store all the headers into an array and return that
        Parameters:
        fileName - String, contains the name of file to opne
        Returns:
        returns array of string or null if not found

      • printUpdatedBank

        public static void printUpdatedBank​(Bank database)
        printUpdatedBank: This method will be accesed once the user decides to terminate the program (not when they decide to log out). Record all the new accounts in Bank Users Updated.txt file.
        Parameters:
        database - Bank: all users (linked list)

      • addUser

        public static void addUser​(Bank db,
                           java.lang.String fn,
                           java.lang.String ln,
                           java.lang.String dob,
                           java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String addr,
                           java.lang.String p,
                           java.lang.String can,
                           java.lang.String san,
                           java.lang.String crdan,
                           java.lang.String checkB,
                           java.lang.String savB,
                           java.lang.String crdB,
                           java.lang.String crdMax)
        addUser: adds all the checked data into linked list
        Parameters:
        db - Bank: all users
        fn - String: first name of new user
        ln - String: last name of new user
        dob - String: Date of birth of new user
        id - String: id of new user
        addr - String: address of new user
        p - String: phone number of new user
        can - String: checking account number of new user
        san - String: savings account number of new user
        crdan - String: credit account number of new user
        checkB - String: checking balance of new user
        savB - String: savings balance of new user
        crdB - String: credit balance of new user
        crdMax - String: credit max of new user

        database - Bank: all users (linked list)
        Returns:
        boolean: user added

        database - bank: all users (linked list )
        Returns:

      • inquireBalance

        public static boolean inquireBalance​(Bank user,
                                     boolean isTransactionFile,
                                     java.lang.String view)
        inquireBalance: This method will display the account details of the user logged in. Whether it be checking, savings, or credit, the user will be able to see their account
        Parameters:
        user - Bank: user using account
        isTransactionFile - boolean: using transaction file
        view - view: which account to view
        Returns:
        boolean: user was successful in getting account information

      • deposit

        public static boolean deposit​(Bank user,
                              boolean isTransactionFile,
                              java.lang.String source,
                              double amount)
        deposit: This method will get the users account and deposit the amount they entered. User decides which account the money will be added to.
        Parameters:
        user - Bank: user logged in
        isTransactionFile - Boolean: using transaction file
        source - StringL what account to use
        amount - Double: how much to deposit
        Returns:
        boolean: successful

      • withdraw

        public static boolean withdraw​(Bank user,
                               boolean isTransactionFile,
                               java.lang.String source,
                               double amount)
        withdraw: This method will get the users account an will withdraw money from it. The only account the user can withdraw from would be from their checkings account.
        Parameters:
        user - Bank: user logged in
        isTransactionFile - boolean: using transaction file
        source - String which account to use
        amount - String: how much to withdraw
        Returns:
        boolean: successful

      • transfer

        public static boolean transfer​(Bank user,
                               Bank database,
                               boolean isTransactionFile,
                               java.lang.String senderName,
                               java.lang.String senderSource,
                               Bank recieverName,
                               java.lang.String recieverDestination,
                               double amount)
        transfer: This method will make a transfer. The user will be able to transfer money from their account or to other customers accounts. The user can choose to which account they want to transfer to
        Parameters:
        user - Bank: user logged in
        database - Bank: all users (linked list)
        isTransactionFile - boolean: using transaction file
        senderName - String: sender name
        senderSource - String: sender source
        recieverName - String: reciever name
        recieverDestination - String: recieverDestination
        amount - String: how much to transfer
        Returns:
        boolean: succesful

      • createBank

        public static Bank createBank​(java.lang.String[] fields)
        createBank: This method will get the txt which contains all the user data and will take certain data fields and initialize them to their apporpiate class. Once all data has been organized, the instances will be set in a linked list as a node.
        Parameters:
        fields - [] String: header array
        Returns:
        Bank: all users (linked list)

      • checkDuplicates

        public static boolean checkDuplicates​(Bank db,
                                      java.lang.String fn,
                                      java.lang.String ln)
        checkDuplicates: goes through the bank and checks if there are any users with the same name
        Parameters:
        db - Bank: all users (linked list)
        fn - String: first name of user being checked
        ln - String: last name of user being checked
        Returns:
        Boolean: duplicate found, false if not

        public static boolean fileExistence()
        fileExistence: The method will check the Bank Users2.txt and make sure that the file exits and that it at least contains 1 line of Customer data.
        Returns:
        boolean: file exists
